title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain pasta and mix immediately with pancetta, egg mixture, and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked.
In a pan, heat tomato puree and cream, then add the grilled chicken.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: A simple and healthy breakfast favorite.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Mash avocado in a bowl and season with salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Spread the mixture over toast and top with chili flakes or lemon juice.
